column1:
The overall negative sentiment percentages for each aspect are as follows:

Cleaniness: 0%
Amenities: 0%
Location: 0%
Services: 0%
General: 0%
Value: 0%

Suggestions to improve in each aspect based on the dataframe: 

Cleaniness: Increase efforts to maintain a clean environment in the area.

Amenities: Make changes to provide more amenities in the area.

Location: Consider making changes to the location to make it more accessible and attractive.

Services: Take steps to improve the quality of customer service in the area.

General: Make changes to make the area more inviting and welcoming.

Value: Take steps to improve the overall value of the area for customers.
